ValidationRule.description: Verify that the Developer Reviewer field is not blank before the Developer Approved field is set to "Yes" Updated 11/5/2019 per NICC-038406
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND(OR(RecordType.Name = 'Hosted RFC',RecordType.Name = 'HRM RFC',RecordType.Name = 'PMS RFC'), ISPICKVAL( Developer_Approved__c, "Yes"), ISBLANK( Developer_Reviewer__c ))
/* ORIGINAL CODE RecordTypeId = "0126000000016TJ" && ISPICKVAL( Developer_Approved__c, "Yes") && ISBLANK( Developer_Reviewer__c ) */
ValidationRule.errorMessage: A Developer Reviewer must be assigned to this RFC before the Developer Approved field can be set to "Yes"
